General.Name: InPlay Oil Corp
General.Description: InPlay Oil Corp. engages in the acquisition, exploration, development, and production of petroleum and natural gas properties in Canada. The company produces and sells crude oil, natural gas, and natural gas liquids. It also produces light-oil primarily in the Willesden Green area of central Alberta. InPlay Oil Corp. is headquartered in Calgary, Canada.
General.Address: 2000-350 7th Avenue SW, Calgary, AB, Canada, T2P 3N9
